name: Weather Bot Skill
description: A skill that provides current weather information for a specified city using OpenWeatherMap.

endpoints.name: production
endpoints.description: Production endpoint for the Weather Bot Skill.

message.description: Handles general conversational messages and can initiate weather queries.

conversationUpdate.name: conversationUpdate
conversationUpdate.description: Handles conversation update activities, e.g., welcoming new members.

getWeatherAction.name: getWeather
getWeatherAction.description: Gets the current weather conditions for a given city.

city.description: The name of the city to get weather for.

weatherInfo.description: A summary of the weather conditions (e.g., temperature, description).
